item.description:
9:00 - 11:00am
Career Invigoration: Best Practices on Writing a Technical Resume
88 Sydney Street (Vertex Pharmaceuticals)
Looking to invigorate or kick start your career in the Sciences? Vertex Pharmaceuticals, Inc. would like to help you achieve your potential. Writing a great resume does not mean you need to follow all of the rules you’ve read about resume writing. Your resume does not have to be one page or follow a specific resume format. Every resume is a one-of-a-kind marketing communication. It should be tailored to your needs and the positions you are applying for. We invite you to attend our morning program called Best Practices on Writing a Resume. For the first hour, two Vertex Staffing Professionals will share a few practices they feel are best for developing a highly effective resume. After a brief Q&A, we will break off into smaller groups for one - on - one resume review and discussion. Please note this is NOT a recruiting event. The purpose of this exercise is to reach out to our community so you can reach your career potential. Please RSVP to Tracy_Chandler@vrtx.com no later than April 29th. Seating is limited to 50 participants.
Cost: Free
